src_original: dṛśyate svapnavad bimbaṃ tad bimbaṃ bhāvayet sadā // Sekoddeśa_27 //
abhāve bhāvanā bimbe yogināṃ sā na bhāvanā /
tat prādeśikanetrābhyāṃ gatvā paśyanti sādhakāḥ // Sekoddeśa_32 //
yadi paśyati sadrūpaṃ svamukhaṃ kiṃ na paśyati /  yadi paśyatyasadrūpaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ kathaṃ na ca // Sekoddeśa_33 //
